Stupid OpenStack Tricks
http://blog.oddbit.com/post/2014-01-16-stupid-openstack-tricks/ 2014-01-16T00:00:00+0000 2014-01-16T00:00:00+0000 I work with several different OpenStack installations. I usually work on the command line, sourcing in an appropriate stackrc with credentials as necessary, but occasionally I want to use the dashboard for something. For all of the deployments with which I work, the keystone endpoint is on the same host as the dashboard. So rather than trying to remember which dashboard url I want for the environment I’m currently using on the command line, I put together this shell script:
